name: The Empress
languages: Common, Deep Speech, Undercommon, Telepathy 120 ft.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the Empress fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The Empress has advantage on saving throws against Spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed Empress gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

desc.intro: The Empress's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Empress makes two attacks: one Mind Tentacle and one Psionic Crush.

actions.name: Mind Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage. If the target is hit by two Mind Tentacle attacks in one turn, it must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw or be Stunned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Psionic Crush
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (6d8) force damage. This attack ignores temporary hit points.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The Empress magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 54 (12d8) psychic damage and is Stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
